mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "Square Dance Date Book", "On the Record and Record Report", "As I See It, by Bob Osgood", "Overseas Dateline", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "Style Series: To Twirl or Not to Twirl", "Round Dancing: History, Part III by Kay and Forrest Richards", "Americana: by Terry Golden", "New Basics-Reject or Retain, by Carter Humphrey", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "The Caller of the Month: Harold Bausch", "Paging the Roundancers: Jack and Darlene Chaffee", and "Experimental Lab: Split the Star".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
